item.description:
Please take a moment to read the ENTIRE update, as I have updated the new meetup dates/locations.
MEETUPS AT 1:00PM



Please note our next SUNDAY meetup will be held at Doggie Day ONLY @ 1PM!

The spring season is here!!!Time to get those pups out and about. We will be hosting a "Easter Sunday" meetup at Doggie Day playcenter during our regular time.

Looking ahead, I would like to resume our outdoor/indoor meetups starting in May, where we will meet at 11am in the Boston Common @ 11am and Doggie Day @ 1pm! this way members have more option to enjoy the indoor outdoor season...Stay tuned for more info...

Indoor meetup will be held at Doggie day (1-3pm)


Should anyone have any questions, feel free to contact me.
Susana
item.name: The Boston Chihuahua April Meetup
